verses.name: Revelation 18:9
verses.text: And the kings of the earth, who have committed fornication and lived deliciously with her, shall bewail her, and lament for her, when they shall see the smoke of her burning,

verses.name: Revelation 18:10
verses.text: Standing afar off for the fear of her torment, saying, Alas, alas, that great city Babylon, that mighty city! for in one hour is thy judgment come.

verses.name: Revelation 18:11
verses.text: And the merchants of the earth shall weep and mourn over her; for no man buyeth their merchandise any more:
